name: Picky Peck
description:
Made for Mini Jam 52 in 3 days with the theme being "Summit"

A nasty Bullfrog came and took over your home! Help the Cedar Waxwing become stronger, climb to the mountain top, and reclaim what's yours!

Controls (jam limited to WASD and Arrow Keys):

  • A/D - Move Left / Right
  • S - Peck Attack
  • W - Enter Doors
  • Up Arrow - Jump

Credits:

  • Font: Summit Attack - https://www.dafont.com/summit-attack.font
  • Color Palette: Bright Adventure 38 - https://lospec.com/palette-list/brightadventure38
  • Sound Effects: Made with sfxr - http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
  • Engine: Unity
  • Everything Else: Me :)
